    • Method Detail

      • readFromAssets

        public static java.lang.String readFromAssets(android.content.res.AssetManager assets,
                              java.lang.String file)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of a file in the assets directory.
        Parameters:
        assets - To provide access to the assets directory
        file - The name of the asset to open. This name can be hierarchical
        Returns:
        The content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs opening the file

      • readFromInternalStorage

        public static java.lang.String readFromInternalStorage(android.content.Context c,
                                       java.lang.String file)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of a file in internal storage
        Parameters:
        c - To provide access to internal storage
        file - The name of the file to open; can not contain path separators
        Returns:
        The content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs opening the file

      • readFromExternalStorage

        public static java.lang.String readFromExternalStorage(java.lang.String file)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the content of a file in external storage. Note that READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission must be acquired in order to read from external storage.
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file to open. This name can be hierarchical
        Returns:
        The content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs opening the file
